title: Quinoa Pilaf
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1/2 onion, chopped', '1 stalk celery, chopped', '2 carrots, diced', '75g (3 oz) quinoa', '225ml (8 fl oz) hot water', '1 bay leaf', '1 tablespoon lemon zest', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '75g (3 oz) frozen garden peas, thawed', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
